payload.content: The field of AI systems is evolving from single agents to sequential agents, then to agent teams, and finally to agent swarms.

name: The field of AI systems is evolving from single agents to sequential agents, the
content: The field of AI systems is evolving from single agents to sequential agents, then to agent teams, and finally to agent swarms.

payload.content: Agent Teams are characterized by predefined roles, where a leader agent delegates tasks and integrates outputs from other agents.

name: Agent Teams are characterized by predefined roles, where a leader agent delegate
content: Agent Teams are characterized by predefined roles, where a leader agent delegates tasks and integrates outputs from other agents.

payload.content: An Agent Swarm involves a goal agent that automatically spawns other agents, and a synthesizer that clusters and reconciles their findings, similar to a random forest algorithm.

name: An Agent Swarm involves a goal agent that automatically spawns other agents, and
content: An Agent Swarm involves a goal agent that automatically spawns other agents, and a synthesizer that clusters and reconciles their findings, similar to a random forest algorithm.

payload.content: Deep Research is a supervisor-driven approach that narrows and verifies information to reduce uncertainty, prioritizing accuracy and avoiding errors.

name: Deep Research is a supervisor-driven approach that narrows and verifies informat
content: Deep Research is a supervisor-driven approach that narrows and verifies information to reduce uncertainty, prioritizing accuracy and avoiding errors.

payload.content: An Agent Swarm prioritizes parallel exploration to maximize discovery, accepting the risk of missing something in favor of broad exploration.

name: An Agent Swarm prioritizes parallel exploration to maximize discovery, accepting
content: An Agent Swarm prioritizes parallel exploration to maximize discovery, accepting the risk of missing something in favor of broad exploration.

payload.content: Agent Teams focus on structured execution, allowing control over agent roles and actions.

name: Agent Teams focus on structured execution, allowing control over agent roles and
content: Agent Teams focus on structured execution, allowing control over agent roles and actions.

payload.content: To prevent multi-agent systems from consuming excessive tokens, it is practical to constrain the number of agents and their tool usage.

name: To prevent multi-agent systems from consuming excessive tokens, it is practical
content: To prevent multi-agent systems from consuming excessive tokens, it is practical to constrain the number of agents and their tool usage.
